Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.provider.saml.CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder

  • Packages that use CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.provider.saml  

    • Uses of CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder in com.stormpath.sdk.provider.saml

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.provider.saml that return CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder SamlRequestFactory.builder()
      Creates a new CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder that allows you to build Saml-specific CreateProviderRequests.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder.setAttributeStatementMappingRules(AttributeStatementMappingRules attributeStatementMappingRules)
      Sets the rules for mapping SAML Assertion Attributes to Stormpath Account attributes for Accounts created in the associated Stormpath Directory.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder.setEncodedX509SigningCert(String encodedX509SigningCert)
      Sets the PEM-formatted X.509 certificate used validate the SAML Identity Provider's signed SAML assertions.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder.setRequestSignatureAlgorithm(String requestSignatureAlgorithm)
      Sets the algorithm used by the SAML Identity provider to sign SAML assertions.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder.setSsoLoginUrl(String ssoLoginUrl)
      Sets the URL at the SAML Identity Provider where end-users should be redirected to login.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder.setSsoLogoutUrl(String ssoLogoutUrl)
      Sets the URL at the SAML Idenity Provider where end-users should be redirected to logout of all applications.
